Package com.smaato.soma

Interface Summary
SomaActionCallback A callback used by the SomaLibrary to invoke actions of banners.
SomaConnector Allows developers to tunnel network communications of the SOMA solution in the online API.
 

Class Summary
BannerAction Internal class for storing banner data.
BannerCanvas Displays a banner in a Canvas - this is a convenience class that can be used by implementations for easily displaying banners.
BannerCustomItem Manages a low level banner in a CustomItem
BannerDescription Internal class for managing banner data.
BannerItem Displays a banner using lowlevel functionality.
SomaLibrary Allows to access the smaato advertisement server and to display banners.
 

Exception Summary
RegistrationException Indicates a regsitration error like wrong application IDs
SomaException An exception raised when soma specific funtionality fails.
SynchronizationException Is thrown when SOMA cannot be synchronized, e.g.
